seg.source: 围头村具有得天独厚的海洋环境，坐拥自然生态和人文生态两大休闲旅游资源。
seg.translation: Weitou Village is blessed with a unique marine environment, offering two major recreational tourism resources of rich ecosystems and cultural landscapes.
Wai Tau Village has a unique marine environment, sitting in the natural ecological and humanistic ecological two leisure tourism resources.
Weitou Village has a unique marine environment, sitting on the natural ecology and human ecology of the two major leisure tourism resources.
